name: Xbox/P4 console NWN let play Mods?
author: Asturonethoriusaline

posts.author: Asturonethoriusaline
posts.content:
Hey Hi all. I was thinking of getting NWN on XBox One. But I was wondering if would be able to play the PW's, and the DLC Mods, and the Vault/User created Mods like Aielund, etc, on the XBox One version of NWN.

Has anyone done that, this?? Or even if not, does anyone know if that is possible to do on the XBox One version of NWN??

Also has anybody played NWN on either XBox One or P4??? And if so, what was it like???

Thanks

Mike

posts.author: wildleaf
posts.content:
That's a good question, it might be worth asking on the Beamdog forums. I know I've seen people playing on the Switch on hakless PWs, but never seen it mentioned elsewhere.

Haven't you been playing WoG on Android? If so it might be similar, but don't take my word for it. Definitely try and connect with Beamdog support.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
https://www.beamdog.com/news/multiplaye ... d-edition/

As such, it looks like Arelith and Ravenloft are accessable.

I do not know if XBox One supports hak and tlk stuff for PWs (by this, I mean letting one use custom hak and tlk stuff on the XBox One).
